official-title.#text:
To provide that the Social Security Administration pay fees associated with obtaining birth
			 certificate or State identification card for purposes of obtaining a
			 replacement social security card for certain victims of domestic violence,
			 and for other purposes.

A provision by a person described in subclause (I) of authorization to release information about
			 the person, and the provision of information pursuant to the
			 authorization, shall not be construed to be a waiver of any privilege of
			 the person, under Federal or State law, relating to the confidentiality of
			 communications between a domestic violence victim and an advocate of such
			 a victim.

The amendments made by subsection (a) shall apply to applications submitted after the 90-day period
			 that begins with the date of the enactment of this Act.
